Description: Wooden object with handle modelled in the form of a human finger. The object probably served as the sliding bolt for the door of a shrine.
Curator's comments: A similar example is Louvre N. 1527. It is interpreted as the bolt for the door of a shrine by M. Etienne, in Les Portes du Ciel, 305, no. 257.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
